Database Queries

Query exact match
query_fuzzy_match()
Query fuzzy match

Retrieve GBIF occurrences from polygon

Extract the rainbio database from a spatial query

Extract the Rainbio database from a species list

List, extract taxa
retrieve_occ_data()
Retrieve GBIF occurrences
search_species_info()
Search species information
